text:
@paulkrugman Sure because everyone knows retired people in Florida are white supremacist and deserve to die. We won't even bring up the fact your state NY, sent COVID-19 victims into nursing homes and a quarter of all deaths happened there.

Liberal hack.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
